kw.name: Run
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the output.

arguments.arg: docker run -v ${SSH_KEYFILE}:/root/.ssh/mcp.rsa -v /tmp/:/vuls/results/ -v /tmp/gost-log:/var/log/vuls -v /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime:ro -v /etc/timezone:/etc/timezone:ro --entrypoint /bin/sh vuls/vuls -c "rm -rf /vuls/environment.sh && echo '$(cat /opt/akraino/validation/tests/os/vuls/environment.sh)' > /vuls/environment.sh && echo '$(sed -e 's|HOST|${HOST}|g' -e 's|USERNAME|${USERNAME}|g' /opt/akraino/validation/tests/os/vuls/config.toml)' > /vuls/config.toml && cat /vuls/config.toml && chmod +x /vuls/environment.sh && /vuls/environment.sh "

kw.msg: Running command 'docker run -v /var/lib/opnfv/mcp.rsa:/root/.ssh/mcp.rsa -v /tmp/:/vuls/results/ -v /tmp/gost-log:/var/log/vuls -v /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime:ro -v /etc/timezone:/etc/timezone:ro --entrypoint /bin/sh vuls/vuls -c "rm -rf /vuls/environment.sh && echo '$(cat /opt/akraino/validation/tests/os/vuls/environment.sh)' > /vuls/environment.sh && echo '$(sed -e 's|HOST|172.16.10.36|g' -e 's|USERNAME|ubuntu|g' /opt/akraino/validation/tests/os/vuls/config.toml)' > /vuls/config.toml && cat /vuls/config.toml && chmod +x /vuls/environment.sh && /vuls/environment.sh "'.

kw.name: Run
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the output.
